ProfessionalProjects.name: Button Soccer Arena
ProfessionalProjects.fullDescription: My name is João Fortunato Jr, I am a game developer and I live in Brazil. I decided in mid-2012 that I would turn my passion for games into my profession so I started to study and develop simple projects using Unity Engine. In 2014 I graduated from high school, in 2015 in technical education in computer science, where I had my first solid contact with programming, and in 2016 i started my Digital Games degree at FACENS, graduating in 2018 when I started working as a unity developer. ProfessionalProjects.description: seeks through a playful way to pass prevention guidelines to COVID-19 following the recommendations of the brazilian Ministry of Health.

ProfessionalProjects.name: Joy & Toy
ProfessionalProjects.description: it is a 2D sidescroller endless runner mixed with a lane-runner style game akin to Sonic based on a famous brazilian children's tv series.

ProfessionalProjects.name: Trader Life

ProfessionalProjects.name: Quintal Uirapuru
